abstract: Order of Malta, sovereign entity with diplomatic relations in 105 countries and permanent observer status at the United Nations, holds its first fund-raising event in New York at the Metropolitan Club.
lead_paragraph: The Order of Malta, a sovereign entity with diplomatic relations in 105 countries, edges into the New York social fund-raising circuit.

headline.main: A Black-Tie Ball Fit for a Knight
headline.print_headline: Dress Code: Black Tie, Armor Optional

snippet: The Order of Malta, a sovereign entity with diplomatic relations in 105 countries, edges into the New York social fund-raising circuit.
